item.title: What We Know About ChatGPT’s New Parental Controls
item.description: OpenAI said parents can set time and content limits on accounts, and receive notifications if ChatGPT detects signs of potential self-harm.

item.title: With New U.S. Proposal to End Gaza War, a Rare Moment of Triumph for Netanyahu
item.description: In President Trump’s plan, Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu got almost everything he hoped for in the end, despite mounting international isolation.

item.title: Poll Shows Big Drop in American Support for Israel, and YouTube Settles Trump Lawsuit
item.description: Plus, how live betting is changing the world of sports.

item.title: Hundreds of Top Military Officers Gather for Meeting With Trump and Hegseth
item.description: The U.S. generals and admirals summoned from around the world have been given little information about the planned event.

item.title: Government Shutdown Could Delay Economic Data at a Critical Moment
item.description: “Flying blind amidst heavy fog is a dangerous proposition,” one economist said about the risks of a lapse in official statistics.
